name: V.O.D.K.A. Open World Survival Shooter
description:
V. O. D. K. A. is a survival shooter in the open world, the game takes place in a fictional state in eastern Europe, most of the territory of which is infected with radiation. Your main task is survival. Watch the characteristics of your character, look for food and water. Try to avoid mutants or use a diverse arsenal of weapons to destroy them. And beware of other survivors, they are not your friends. In this harsh world, a person can be worse than any monsters.

Main Features


  • Open world
  • Hunger and thirst
  • Dangerous enemies (humans and mutants)
  • A wide range of weapons
  • Unexplained anomalies
  • Atmosphere of nuclear post-apocalypse
